definition: speech sounds/pronunciation/colloquial (rather than literary) pronunciation of a Chinese character/phonetic/audio/voice/(Internet) to voice chat/voice message
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

pinyin: duan3 shi2 yu3 yin1 ji4 yi4

definition: VoIP (Voice over IP) (computing)/to speak with others over the Internet

pinyin: yu3 yin1 tong1 xun4 tong1 dao4

sentences.english: His voice still stood with courage.
sentences.chinese: 他的语音依然是那么勇敢坚定。

sentences.english: Teacher points the words and students read after it.
sentences.chinese: 师用拍手的方式，让学生跟读几个单词的规范语音。

sentences.english: The enhanced speech signals of the proposed algorithm have better clearness and intelligibility besides higher output SNR.
sentences.chinese: 增强后的语音具有更好的可懂度和清晰度。

sentences.english: Roach, P. English Phonetics and Phonology. Cambridge University Press, 1983.
sentences.chinese: 王桂珍，《英语语音教程》，高等教育出版社。

sentences.english: The later is also one of the main headstreams of voices recorded in Qie Yun.
sentences.chinese: 古关中话也是《切韵》所记录语音的主要源头之一。

sentences.english: Studies on historical phonetic change of Chinese is traditionally called Chinese phonology in China.
sentences.chinese: 汉语历史语音变化的研究，在我国传统称为音韵学。

sentences.english: Alas, there’s no audio commentary so the offside rule remains a mystery.
sentences.chinese: 唉，因为没有现场语音解说，越位判定仍然是一个谜。

sentences.english: The compartment regulars between dialect and Mandrain are the important basis of dialect correctness.
sentences.chinese: 方言与普通话语音对应规律是方音辨正的重要依据。

sentences.english: But there is something really powerful when voice moves into the cloud.
sentences.chinese: 但是当语音转到云计算下就变成了一股强大的力量。

sentences.english: Chongyun is a special phonetic phenomenon in Guangyun phonology , What actually Chongyun implies, which has been a puzzle in study field.
sentences.chinese: 重韵是《切韵》音系中比较特殊的一种语音现象。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a voice-based man-machine communication system and method.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开一种基于语音的人机通讯系统和方法。

sentences.english: Switch off your phone and allow messages to go to voicemail.
sentences.chinese: 将你手机关机，让信息转到语音信箱。

sentences.english: The idea of voice-activated search has been around for some time.
sentences.chinese: 用语音激活进行搜索的设想由来已久。

sentences.english: Wavelet transform and Wiener filtering are combined to denoise speech.
sentences.chinese: 将小波变换与维纳滤波结合起来对语音进行去噪。

sentences.english: We didn't record lesson 78 yesterday evening.
sentences.chinese: 昨天晚上，我们没有录制第78课的语音文件。

sentences.english: In processing the phonetics of Chinese characters associated with semantics, subjects showed within-hemispheric dominance.
sentences.chinese: 与语义相关联的汉字语音加工表现出半球内优势。

definition: to hold a conversation/to talk over the telephone/phone call
VoIP (Voice over IP) (computing)/to speak with others over the Internet

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3
